Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-32728 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-32728 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 8.9p1-8, affected by CVE-2025-32728
